document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Husteem Villa on Sighing Maiden's Walk.
document_data.name: Husteem Villa
document_data.location: [[Delzorin Street]] & [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]], [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]], [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Husteem Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Husteem]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the western section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]] on the northeast corner of where [[Delzorin Street]] joined the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]]. The northern part of the villa also touched [[Sighing Maiden's Walk]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: The walled compound contained three separate buildings. The largest building sat on the west side of the villa. Each building was three or four stories tall.
